name: browser_take_screenshot
description: Take a screenshot of the current page. You can't perform actions based on the screenshot, use browser_snapshot for actions.

type.description: Image format for the screenshot. Default is png.

filename.description: File name to save the screenshot to. Defaults to page-{timestamp}.{png|jpeg} if not specified.

element.description: Description of the element, if taking a screenshot of an element

ref.description: CSS selector for the element, if taking a screenshot of an element

fullPage.description: When true, takes a screenshot of the full scrollable page, instead of the currently visible viewport. Cannot be used with element screenshots.

viewId.description: Target browser tab ID. If omitted, uses the last interacted tab.
